title: Pearson spends summer teaching English in Guatemala (University of the Ozarks)
text: ( Source : University of the Ozarks ) Release Date : 10/13 / 2015 How does a college student from Springdale , Ark. , end up in Guatemala teaching English to the locals and working on her own Spanish-speaking competency? If you ask University of
